TiRank
  • API Reference
  • tirank.TrainPre
  • tirank.TrainPre.Train_one_epoch
  • View page source

tirank.TrainPre.Train_one_epochÔÉÅ

tirank.TrainPre.Train_one_epoch(model, dataloader_A, dataloader_B, mode='Cox', infer_mode='SC', adj_A=None, adj_B=None, pre_patho_labels=None, optimizer=None, alphas=[1, 1, 1, 1], device='cpu', epoch=0)[source]ÔÉÅ

Performs a single training epoch for the TiRank multi-task model.

This function iterates through the sc/st data (dataloader_B) and computes the composite loss against the bulk data (dataloader_A) and regularization terms (adjacency matrices, MMD, etc.). It then performs a backward pass and optimizer step.

Parameters:

  • model (TiRankModel) ‚Äì The TiRank model to be trained.

  • dataloader_A (DataLoader) ‚Äì DataLoader for the bulk data (train).

  • dataloader_B (DataLoader) ‚Äì DataLoader for the sc/st data.

  • mode (str, optional) ‚Äì Analysis mode (‚ÄòCox‚Äô, ‚ÄòClassification‚Äô, ‚ÄòRegression‚Äô).

  • infer_mode (str, optional) ‚Äì Inference data type (‚ÄòSC‚Äô or ‚ÄòST‚Äô).

  • adj_A (torch.Tensor, optional) ‚Äì Adjacency matrix for sc/st data (e.g., from connectivities).

  • adj_B (torch.Tensor, optional) ‚Äì Adjacency matrix for spatial distance (ST only).

  • pre_patho_labels (pd.Series, optional) ‚Äì Ground truth pathology labels (ST only).

  • optimizer (torch.optim.Optimizer, optional) ‚Äì The optimizer.

  • alphas (list, optional) ‚Äì List of floats to weight the loss components [reg_loss, bulk_loss, cosine_loss_exp, spatial/patho_loss].

  • device (str, optional) ‚Äì The compute device (‚Äòcpu‚Äô or ‚Äòcuda‚Äô).

  • epoch (int, optional) ‚Äì The current epoch number (for prototype loss scheduling).

Returns:

A dictionary of the average loss values for this epoch.

Return type:

dict
